Author: nlewis4

Comment: Trump seems to shoot himself in the foot anytime he tries to “fix” something.  He either doesn’t understand what GDP is, or he can’t explain what is happening.  If he were savvy about messaging, he’d claim the GDP reduction without hesitation. The GDP sank because companies stocked up on imports destined to be tariffed. That means the US imported more than it produced. In addition, government spending sank.  He claims he wants more of a privately driven economy and not a government driven one.  Well, it happened, but then he says it was Biden? And how did Biden cause companies to import more?  Dems need to get much better at discussing these nuances than just howling at everything. Obviously, once the inventory dries up, there will be bare shelves, and high prices.  That needs to be put in Trump’s face. Don’t let him craft the narrative by responding with juvenile name calling and “slams”. Have a correct, and well articulated response.
Author: Spin_Quarkette
